patthana17.14:4.1: Akusalaṃ micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.14:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.14:5.1: Kusalaṃ sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.14:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.14:6.1: Abyākataṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
